fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.core

Class DateRange

  • Object
    • fr.gouv.vitam.tools.mailextract.core.DateRange

  • public class DateRange
extends Object
    Class for automatic computation of start and end date of folders.

    The start and end date of a folder are the min and max dates of all messages it and all its descendants contain, or, what is the same, of all the messages it directly contains and of the start and end dates of all its subfolders.

    • Method Detail

      • getISODateString

        public static String getISODateString(java.util.Date date)
        Get a compliant ISO date form of a Date.

        YYYY-MM-DD'T'hh:mm:ss'Z' (eg 1997-07-16T19:20:30Z)

        where:

        • YYYY = four-digit year
        • MM = two-digit month (01=January, etc.)
        • DD = two-digit day of month (01 through 31)
        • hh = two digits of hour (00 through 23) (am/pm NOT allowed)
        • mm = two digits of minute (00 through 59)
        • ss = two digits of second (00 through 59)
          • *
        The ending Z is the O hour offset time zone designator in UTC.
        Parameters:
        date - Date
        Returns:
        the ISO date string

      • isDefined

        public boolean isDefined()
        Checks if the date range is defined.
        Returns:
        true, if is defined
